Comment: Companies can't plan their business decisions with a mad king running around whiplashing everyone with on again/off again tariffs.  Countries won't make trade agreements in good faith with a partner they can't trust. They will make partnerships with other countries instead, which look more stable and predictable. That's China and Europe.  Trump needs to go or the US economy is going to crash. He has blown it. Can't be saved. Can't be recovered from.  Imagine it: Trump says "OK guys forget all these tariffs, my bad. My mistake. Got bad advice, not going to do it."  Imagine it because that's the only place you will see that. He cannot (narcissist) admit he made a massive mistake on the one thing he claimed to have expertise in: Business. So he will never back down, and if he does, nobody sane can trust that he won't climb back up some morning with new tariffs or something equally asinine.     HE NEEDS TO GO.
